lagrange.utils

Class VectorMath

  • java.lang.Object
    • lagrange.utils.VectorMath

  • public class VectorMath
extends java.lang.Object

    Title: VectorMath

    Description: A collection of methods for creating and manipulating matrices of primitives.

    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Johnathan Kool

        public static int[] hist(double[] da,
         double[] th)
        Converts a list of values into frequencies based on threshold values,similar to constructing a histogram
        Parameters:

        th - - threshold values
        Returns:
        - the number of elements falling within each bounded class.
